note:
This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

If you're a US citizen who lives abroad, YOU CAN VOTE in the upcoming #2024Election.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

EpicNews.ca - Epic News from Canada and all over the world!

...just another completely indie Canadian news site balancing between the sensational and what really matters.

We try to bring the focus towards humanities, environment, politics, sports, technology, travel and local Canadian news from across the country.

But may end up with the occasional news story about Drake. Just because he's Canadian too.

And we do love hockey and poutine!

Long time resident of California. Writer, singer, musician, aspiring thorn in the side of autocracy. Decidedly progressive in outlook, don’t like anything that other side is trying to do right now. Among my interests are politics, music, science , and the arts. Trying to sort my thoughts out about things by writing here. Hopefully I’ll help others to do this as well. “Government of the people, by the people, for the people, shall not perish from the earth.”

Worked in Democratic politics as researcher and #speechwriter for two #Democrat city council members. My father and grandfather emigrated from Oldham, England in 1912.

An American entrepreneur sharing kindness, positivity, and an occasional cigar. Independent voter.

I'm a retired licensed boiler installer, who decided to become an Ornithologist. I support DSA, and I write a hell of a lot of satire. I'm a photographer, Ornithologist, Poet, and I read as much history as humanly possible...

And the background photo is of a Dinosaur that I photographed at Plum Marsh.

Aside from all that, I live in the East Village of Manhattan.

Writer and self-published author of novels and literary non-fiction. Presently labouring on my work in progress provisionally titled 'Innocence'. Residing again in Canada after living and working in over 15 different countries, left-leaning, concerned about the environment and wildlife, social issues, religious fanaticism, the misuse of AI and facial recognition, and the growth of the drug trade. I'm an OAP, not odious and putrid but an old age pensioner living with my cat and best buddy Sparky.

“You maniacs! You blew it up! Damn you!” Part time escapee to La Isla Nena. Realist, nearly-retired with respect for the Earth. MS Math/CompSci UCLA.
Locus, Sun Microsystems; PDP-11, x86, C, Go.
Programming since 1973.
I wrote the program that calculated the GPA that appears on my high-school transcript.

Starting in 1984 I led the project at Locus to create the first x86 virtual machine, to run MS-DOS under Unix, on the AT&T 6300 Plus (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/6300_Plus).

The lines in the avatar are horizontal.
née Twitter @weaselx86
There should be no profit in human misery.

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
